events.message: I received the wrong color for the jacket I ordered and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The system classified the issue as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery reported by the customer.
Support agent Maria has been assigned to handle the refund case regarding the customer's order discrepancy.
Hello! I’m Maria from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the incorrect jacket sent.
Could you please provide a photo of the jacket you received and your order number so we can start the refund process?
Sure, I have attached the photos showing the wrong color, and my order number is 9823475. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and send you a confirmation email within 2 business days.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the timely help and look forward to receiving the refund confirmation.
Your refund has been processed successfully. The amount should appear on your payment method within 5-7 business days.
We just wanted to check in and confirm that you have received your refund and are satisfied with the resolution.
As we have received no further questions, we are closing your refund case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
Please take a moment to complete a short survey about your refund experience to help us improve our service.
